# Research Summary

```{r}
tribble(
  # nolint start
  ~Publications, ~Citations, ~"h-Index", ~"Mean CNCI", ~"Mean Impact Factor", ~Funding,
  research_profile$pubs, research_profile$cites, research_profile$h_index, research_profile$mean_cnci, research_profile$mean_jif, "> $1 million"
  # nolint end
) %>%
  knitr::kable(format = "latex", align = rep("c", 5)) %>%
  kableExtra::row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_minimal(latex_options = "hold_position", full_width = TRUE)
```
